MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Keywords: ActiveX, chart, control, plot, visualization, tolerance, curve
English.Char_Desc_80: Real-time ActiveX chart control with built-in tools for technical applications
English.Char_Desc_250: DynaPlot is a real-time ActiveX chart control for technical applications. It features dynamic scaling of chart elements with control size, tolerance masks, built-in tools like cursors, markers, scroll, pan, zoom...
English.Char_Desc_450: DynaPlot is a real-time chart control for technical and scientific applications. It features dynamic scaling of chart elements with control size, tolerance masks, built-in tools like cursors, markers, scroll, pan, zoom... Although flexible and comprehensive, DynaPlot's programming interface is easy to learn which makes it the tool of choice for both T+M and rapid application development. Examples in VB, VC, VB.NET,C#... help you to get started.
English.Char_Desc_2000: DynaPlot is a real-time chart control for technical and scientific applications. It features dynamic scaling of chart elements with control size, tolerance masks, built-in tools like cursors, markers, scroll, pan, zoom... Although flexible and comprehensive, DynaPlot's programming interface is easy to learn which makes it the tool of choice for both T+M and rapid application development. Examples in VB, VC, VB.NET,C#... help you to get started.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: DynaPlot is distributed as "shareware". You may freely copy and distribute the DynaPlot DISTRIBUTION FILE in unmodified form. However, it is prohibited to modify the DISTRIBUTION FILE or to distribute any components extracted from it.
Permissions.EULA:
DynaPlot GENERAL LICENSE AGREEMENT
NOTICE: BY INSTALLING AND USING DynaPlot YOU ARE AGREEING TO BE BOUND BY THE TERMS OF THIS AGREEMENT. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO THE TERMS OF THIS AGREEMENT, PROMPTLY DELETE ALL DynaPlot FILES FROM YOUR COMPUTER.
1) OWNER: The manufacturer of this software and the owner of all associated copyrights is Wilhelm Kurz of Zenettistrasse 41, D-80337 Munich, Germany ("The Author").
2) APPLICABILITY: This AGREEMENT is a GENERAL LICENSE AGREEMENT which applies to all users of DynaPlot. If you have other licensing agreements with The Author for the use of DynaPlot, terms of this agreement which are not specifically addressed in those agreements shall be considered amendments to those agreements.
3) AS IS: DynaPlot, WHETHER OR NOT REGISTERED, IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND. The Author DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL The Author OR HIS SUPPLIERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES WHATSOEVER (INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, DAMAGES FOR LOSS OF BUSINESS PROFITS, BUSINESS INTERRUPTION, LOSS OF BUSINESS INFORMATION, OR OTHER PECUNIARY LOSS) ARISING OUT OF THE USE OF OR INABILITY TO USE ANY DynaPlot SOFTWARE, EVEN IF The Author HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. BECAUSE SOME STATES DO NOT ALLOW THE EXCLUSION OR LIMITATION OF LIABILITY FOR CONSEQUENTIAL OR INCIDENTAL DAMAGES, THE ABOVE LIMITATION MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU.
4) DISTRIBUTION: DynaPlot is distributed as "shareware". You may freely copy and distribute the DynaPlot DISTRIBUTION FILE in unmodified form. However, it is prohibited to modify the DISTRIBUTION FILE or to distribute any components extracted from it.
5) LICENSE TYPES: DynaPlot is available as Professional Version, Student Version, OEM User License, OEM Manufacturer License, Site License and Global License.
DynaPlot Student Version has restricted functionality and is for private, educational purposes only.
DynaPlot Professional Version grants you the right to install DynaPlot on one computer. You may manufacture and distribute applications developed with DynaPlot Professional Version free of royalties.
A DynaPlot OEM Manufacturer License grants you the right to pass on the OEM USER REGISTRATION KEY provided to you by the Author to Users of your products which include DynaPlot as a component. By receving the OEM USER REGISTRATION KEY a user ("User") is granted a DynaPlot OEM User License. A DynaPlot OEM Manufacturer may distribute free trial versions of his product but will charge a nonegligible price for the final product to prevent uncontrolled distribution of free DynaPlot OEM User Licenses.
A DynaPlot OEM User License grants you the right to manufacture and distribute applications which include DynaPlot if and only if the OEM Manufacturer's control or application is also used in and shipped with these applications.
A DynaPlot Site License extends DynaPlot Professional Version by the right to install DynaPlot on any number of computers at one company site.
A DynaPlot Global License extends DynaPlot Professional Version by the right to install DynaPlot on any number of computers world wide.
6) TRIAL PERIOD: When you install the DynaPlot program by extracting files from the DISTRIBUTION FILE and copying them to a given computer, a trial period of 60 days begins. DynaPlot may be used freely for 60 days operating in an "unregistered" mode. If you do not register DynaPlot, you agree to remove the DynaPlot extraction files from the computer within 60 days after installation. DynaPlot will stop functioning at the end of its trial period.
7) REGISTRATION: REGISTRATION is the process by which you gain full license to use DynaPlot. REGISTRATION is initiated when you provide a suggested REGISTRATION NAME, an e-mail and/or postal address, and the required registration fee, if any, to The Author. Upon receipt of your registration information and fee, The Author will send you return registration information consisting of your official REGISTRATION NAME, the corresponding UNLOCK KEY NUMBER and the serial number of DynaPlot to which your REGISTRATION applies. The Author may assign a REGISTRATION NAME other than what you suggest. Your receipt of this information completes REGISTRATION, which licenses you to use applicable version(s) of DynaPlot indefinitely. You are licensed to use any past, present or future version of DynaPlot which accepts your REGISTRATION NAME and UNLOCK KEY NUMBER.
8) ROYALTIES: DynaPlot is royalty-free. Applications created with DynaPlot may be sold freely. Applications created with unregistered versions of DynaPlot or with DynaPlot Student Version may not be sold.
9) REGISTRATION KEY NUMBER USAGE: You agree not to disclose your confidential REGISTRATION KEY NUMBER to any third party. Holders of a DynaPlot OEM Manufacturer License may distribute the OEM USER REGISTRATION KEY provided to them by The Autor to users of their products which include DynaPlot as a component. A single registration may be used only on a single computer; you must purchase multiple REGISTRATIONS or a DynaPlot Site License or DynaPlot Global License to use DynaPlot on multiple computers. Your REGISTRATION may be transferred to a another computer owned by you simply by installing the DynaPlot files on the new computer and deleting them from the previous computer; however, because the REGISTRATION process gives you knowledge of the confidential REGISTRATION KEY NUMBER, your REGISTRATION is not transferable to a third party.
10) FREE REGISTRATION: The Author may grant FREE REGISTRATIONS for promotional purposes. If The Author has granted you FREE REGISTRATION, it does not imply, acknowledge, or grant any ownership or other rights whatsoever to DynaPlot beyond that of REGISTRATION, as described above.
11) GOVERNING LAW :Any action related to this License will be governed by German law. No choice of law rules of any jurisdiction will apply.
